channel.title: CVE Feed for TYPO3GmbH -- svg_sanitizer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TYPO3GmbH -- svg_sanitizer

item.title: CVE-2020-11070|2024-08-04T11:21:14.616Z -- typo3gmbh -- svg_sanitizer
item.description: The SVG Sanitizer extension for TYPO3 has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in versions before 1.0.3. Slightly invalid or incomplete SVG markup is not correctly processed and thus not sanitized at all. Albeit the markup is not valid it still is evaluated in browsers and leads to cross-site scripting. This is fixed in version 1.0.3.
